title: Travis McMichael, Others Guilty in Ahmaud Arbery Murder Trial: What to Know
sub_head: Three Georgia men were found guilty of murder in killing of 25-year-old Black man
body:
The trial of the three Georgia men charged in the killing of Ahmaud Arbery began Nov. 5 in Brunswick, Ga.
Prosecutors argued Gregory McMichael, his son Travis McMichael and neighbor William “Roddie” Bryan Jr. chased Mr. Arbery, a 25-year-old Black man, and killed him based on unfounded suspicions. Defense attorneys argued he was killed by men trained in law enforcement who were protecting their neighborhood after a rash of burglaries and thefts. All three defendants are white.
